text: Ne logichno, chto chelovek, kotoromu Allakh nisposlal Pisaniye i daroval poleznyye znaniya, mudrost' i prorochestvo, skazal by lyudyam: "Poklonyaytes' mne vmesto Allakha!" A logichno, chtoby on, poluchiv Pisaniye, kotoromu on ikh uchit i kotoroye oni starayutsya postich', prizyval by lyudey byt' blagochestivymi i poklonyat'sya odnomu Allakhu
